channel.title: Mystery box glitches [PI]

item.title: Mystery box glitches [PI]
item.dc:creator: @noobcoderh2o noobcoderh2o
item.description:
@noobcoderh2o wrote:

Pi source
317

Ok so i added mystery box to my server and it has 2 errors.

  1. It suppose to take 50m. but when u open it. it takes all the cash in your inventory.

Here my codes i added

public void givereward() { if (getItems().playerHasItem(995)) { getItems().deleteItem(995, 50000000); getItems().deleteItem(6199, 1); getItems().addItem(randomlottery(), 1); } else sendMessage("You need 50m to open this."); } public static int randomlottery[] = {6585, 4151, 1067, 1115, 6737, 15486, 2653, 2655, 2670, 2671, 2673, 3480, 7158, 11700}; public static int randomlottery() { return randomlottery[(int) (Math.random() * randomlottery.length)]; }

if(itemId == 6199) { c.givereward(); }

if (itemId >= 5509 && itemId <= 5514) { int pouch = -1; int a = itemId; if (a == 5509) pouch = 0; if (a == 5510) pouch = 1; if (a == 5512) pouch = 2; if (a == 5514) pouch = 3; c.getPA().fillPouch(pouch); return; }

Read full topic
